snippet: The P.G.A. of America provided the developer Donald Trump with a double gift, announcing that it had awarded the 2017 Senior P.G.A. Championship to Trump National Golf Club in Washington, and the 2022 P.G.A. Championship to Trump National Golf Club...
abstract: PGA of America provides developer Donald Trump with a double gift, announcing that it has awarded the 2017 Senior PGA Championship to Trump National Golf Club in Washington, and the 2022 PGA Championship to Trump National Golf Club in Bedminster, NJ; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: The P.G.A. of America provided the developer Donald Trump with a double gift, announcing that it had awarded the 2017 Senior P.G.A. Championship to Trump National Golf Club in Washington, and the 2022 P.G.A. Championship to Trump National Golf Club in Bedminster, N.J.

headline.main: Trump Courses to Host Two Events
headline.print_headline: Trump Courses to Host Two Events
